original_title: Court of Appeal gets new Judge and Acting President
original_body_lines: High Court Judge M.C.B. Sanjeeva Morais taking oaths as a judge of the Court of Appeal
Appeal Court Judge Sobitha Rajakaruna sworn in as Acting President of the Court of Appeal
President Ranil Wickremesinghe made new appointments to the Court of Appeal yesterday.
A statement issued by the President’s Media Division (PMD) yesterday noted that High Court Judge M.C.B. Sanjeeva Morais took oaths as a judge of the Court of Appeal.
Meanwhile, Court of Appeal Judge Sobitha Rajakaruna was sworn in as the Acting President of the Court of Appeal.
